snippet: As he set off on a morning-to-midnight march through Ohio, Wisconsin, Iowa and Virginia, Mr. Obama scoffed at Mitt Romney’s recent attempt to appropriate the “change” label.
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; Pres Obama sets off on morning-to-midnight march through Ohio, Wisconsin, Iowa and Virginia; scoffs at Mitt Romney's recent attempt to appropriate 'change' label.
lead_paragraph: As he set off on a morning-to-midnight march through Ohio, Wisconsin, Iowa and Virginia, Mr. Obama scoffed at Mitt Romney’s recent attempt to appropriate the “change” label.

headline.main: Obama, on a Weekend March, Tries to Recapture His Mantle
headline.print_headline: Obama, on a Weekend March, Tries to Recapture His Mantle
